  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ij.plugin.PlugIn
    Deprecated. 
    This IJ1 plugin is no longer needed when using IJ2 commands. Kept here for backwards compatibility

public class Sholl_Utils
extends java.lang.Object
implements ij.plugin.PlugIn
    Utilities for Sholl_Analysis
    Author:
    Tiago Ferreira
    See Also:
    https://github.com/tferr/ASA, http://imagej.net/Sholl

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String arg)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is called when the plugin is loaded. arg is specified in plugins.config. See PlugIn.run(java.lang.String)
        Specified by:
        run in interface ij.plugin.PlugIn
        Parameters:
        arg - If about the "About" dialog is displayed. If sample, a demo image suitable for Sholl analysis is opened.

      • sampleImage

        @Deprecated
public static ij.ImagePlus sampleImage()
        Deprecated. Use ShollUtils.sampleImage() instead
        Returns the plugin's sample image (File>Samples>ddaC Neuron).
        Returns:
        ddaC image, or null if image cannot be retrieved

      • matlabJetColorMap

        public static java.awt.image.IndexColorModel matlabJetColorMap(int backgroundGray)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns an IndexColorModel similar to MATLAB's jet color map.
        Parameters:
        backgroundGray - the gray value (8-bit scale) to be used as the first entry of the LUT. It is ignored if negative.
        Returns:
        The "Jet" LUT with the specified background entry
        See Also:
        Jerome Mutterer alternative

      • baryCenter

        public static double[] baryCenter(double[] xpoints,
                                  double[] ypoints)
        Deprecated. 
        Calculates the centroid of a non-self-intersecting closed polygon. It is assumed that xpoints and ypoints have the same size
        Parameters:
        xpoints - X coordinates of vertices
        ypoints - Y coordinates of vertices
        Returns:
        the centroid {x,y} coordinates
        See Also:
        Centroid of polygon

public static java.lang.String version()
